analysis_general: The job posting contains general bias with a negative polarity, subtly discriminating against individuals based on socio-economic status and educational background. The language used is unprofessional and perpetuates inequality and exclusion in the hiring process. The posting requires a degree from a "top-tier" university, which may discourage candidates from less prestigious institutions from applying. Additionally, the phrase "go-getter" may imply that only highly driven individuals with a certain level of ambition are suitable for the role, potentially excluding those who may not fit this stereotype.
text:
Company: Johnson and Sons
Role: Senior Application Engineer

About Us:
Johnson and Sons is a leading technology firm that prides itself on its innovative solutions and "can-do" attitude. We're looking for a Senior Application Engineer who embodies our values and is ready to take their career to the next level.

Job Description:
As a Senior Application Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing cutting-edge applications that meet the highest standards of quality and reliability. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize project requirements, ensuring timely delivery and exceeding customer expectations.

Responsibilities:

 Design, develop, and deploy scalable and efficient applications
 Collaborate with teams to identify and prioritize project requirements
 Ensure timely delivery and exceed customer expectations
 Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies

Qualifications and Experience:

 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field from a "top-tier" university
 Minimum 5 years of experience in application development, with a proven track record of delivering high-quality projects
 Strong proficiency in programming languages, including Java and Python
 Excellent communication and project management skills

Perks and Benefits:
We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $120,000 to $150,000 USD per year, based on your experience and skills. You'll also enjoy a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance, as well as a 401(k) matching program.

What We're Looking For:
A self-motivated individual who is passionate about technology and willing to put in the extra effort to get the job done. If you're a "go-getter" who is always looking to improve and grow, we want to hear from you.
